#text='' `` Going grocery shopping '' '' Going to the grocery for me is kind of a burden .
#text=I like going ahead and getting everything I need for at least two weeks .
#text=The longer I can wait to have to go back , the better .
#text=I normally go to two different stores .
#text=One is a traditional grocery store and the other is a dollar store .
#text=When I go to the traditional grocery store , I get frustrated because I find it hard to find certain things .
#text=One day , I asked an employee who was working in the baking supplies isle where the baking soda was .
#text=Again , this was on the baking supplies isle .
#text=As I walk through the store looking for things I need , I 'll see a display of chips or something at the end of an isle .
#text=This makes me think that there are chips on that isle .
#text=There are no chips on that isle .
#text=It 's a good trip when I have everything I need for a few weeks .
